knownIssues.title: Applied Skills/Timeline Data Inconsistency
knownIssues.description: Skills appear in timeline but not in Applied Skills section for the same customer
knownIssues.rootCause: Timeline pulls from audit_logs while Applied Skills pulls directly from skill_applications
knownIssues.suggestedFix: Sync data sources or ensure skill application events update both tables

knownIssues.title: Unterminated string literal in timeline-service.ts
knownIssues.description: Error at line 391 - unterminated string literal in logger.info
knownIssues.rootCause: Incomplete template string in logger.info statement
knownIssues.suggestedFix: Complete the template string by adding a closing backtick

knownIssues.title: Constant reassignment warnings in UnifiedTimeline
knownIssues.description: Variables declared with const (skillInfo, customerInfo, proficiencyInfo) being reassigned
knownIssues.rootCause: Using const for variables that need to be mutable
knownIssues.suggestedFix: Change const to let for these variables
